metas.description: The full race card for the Fred Winter Handicap Hurdle including prices and form for each horse in the field.

page.content:
Fred Winter Handicap Hurdle Race Card

The Fred Winter Handicap Hurdle is always a tough one for punters to pick over so we will be trying to help you the best we can with the comprehensive Race Card on offer for punters on race day. The handicap races are always tough so each horse will be detailed with prices and form lines for each contender as well as all the details for the connections of the runners.

Fred Winter Handicap Hurdle Race Card
